features: Mechanical stretch textile for unrestricted mobility
Trim, slim fit, optimizes exceptional breathability during high output
Gusseted underarms for mobility and comfort
Adjustable StormHood™ with soft brim gives added protection when needed
Single chest pocket stores jacket for compact storage
Cord loop attaches to carabiner for easy transport
DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish repels moisture
Tyono™ 30 denier shell with DWR treatment - 100% nylon
